summary:
About PDImprovement Cornerclub
Renovate New Gnisis Cornerclub in Windhelm.
Add furniture such as Solstheim's bed and chair.
Enable accommodation and increase the choice of accommodation to tribal players such as Dark Elf.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#d9ead3][color=#ead1dc][size=5]Latest information[/size][/color]

[color=#ffffff][size=4]Ver1.00[/size][/color]
Improvement Cornerclub has been remodeled considerably and released as a new MOD.

[color=#cfe2f3][size=5]About PDImprovement Cornerclub[/size][/color]
Renovate New Gnisis Cornerclub in Windhelm.
Add furniture such as Solstheim's bed and chair.
Enable accommodation and increase the choice of accommodation to tribal players such as Dark Elf.
[img width=1138,height=640]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/88719/88719-1514951554-736527717.jpeg[/img]
[size=5]
[color=#d9d2e9]Change Point[/color][/size]
Add a furnace. Let NPC warm up around the furnace.
Add a cooking pot to the back of the counter so that the shop owner cooks.
Add a seamless basement floor and set up a guest bed there.
Add Alchemy Lab and Arcane Enchanter to Guest Room.
Add a cooking pot to the basement floor.
Add landlady. Accommodation is possible by speaking to her.
Landlady sells food. Solstheim's food is also sold.
Add a Bard, Make it a lively bar.
On the serif street of Malthyr, Increase the regulars and fill the seats.
[size=5]
[color=#fff2cc]Installation[/color][/size]
Save data in a place away from Windhelm, MOD introduction recommended.
[size=5]
[color=#dbb0a7]Requirements[/color][/size]
Dawnguard HearthFires Dragonborn

[color=#fce5cd][size=5]Compatibility[/size][/color]
MOD to change New Gnisis Cornerclub.
MOD to change Ambarys Rendar and Malthyr Elenil.
There is a possibility of conflict with.
[/color]
author: puratina

files.name: PDImprovementCornerclub 1.00
files.changelogHtml: Improvement Cornerclub has been remodeled considerably and released as a new MOD.
